sentences.sentence: This is one of the few gratifications of an otherwise boring job.
sentences.translation: 这是枯燥的工作中少有的一项乐趣。

sentences.sentence: Rather than forego the veriest gratifications of vanity, he will wring them from the anguish of wretched and ill-fated creatures;
sentences.translation: 他不会摒弃虚荣带来的真正满足感，而是从不幸的生物的痛苦中攫取这种满足；
